arts.ttl: 'I feel utterly horrendous': Unlikely Portsmouth hero longs for his bed after remarkable comeback by Bristol City man
arts.sum: Warrior Rob Atkinson reflected on being Pompey’s hero and insisted: I feel utterly horrendous.

arts.ttl: ‘He couldn’t move’: The incredible story behind two-goal Bristol City man Rob Atkinson’s Portsmouth heroics against Derby County
arts.sum: Rob Atkinson was thrown up front because he couldn’t move as he salvaged Pompey a dramatic point against Derby in a tale of incredible fortitude.

arts.ttl: John Eustace speaks out as Derby County succumb to Portsmouth 'pressure'
arts.sum: John Eustace felt Derby County produced an "excellent all-round performance" after they were denied victory with a 2-2 draw at Portsmouth. The result, coupled with Cardiff's defeat at home to Swansea, kept Derby out of the relegation zone, a point ahead of the Bluebirds.

arts.ttl: 'Absolute warrior, Surprise selection didn't come off, What a competitor': Neil Allen's Portsmouth player ratings against Derby
arts.sum: A stoppage-time goal – on this occasion in Pompey’s favour – as they shared a draw with Derby.

arts.ttl: Derby County player ratings v Portsmouth as trio shine but Rams suffer sucker punch - Leigh Curtis
arts.sum: Derby moved in front when Forsyth teased a terrific cross into the box for Yates to crash a header into the net, but the lead lasted all of 60 seconds as Rob Atkinson equalised from a corner. At the other end, a superb cross from Nathaniel Mendez-Laing was met by Jerry Yates which then forced a panicked clearance before Craig Forsyth lashed a good chance over the bar.

arts.ttl: Rob Atkinson has eventful day as Portsmouth and Derby share spoils
arts.sum: The defender scored three times at Fratton Park.

arts.ttl: Atkinson the late hero as he saves Portsmouth point in dramatic Derby County clash
arts.sum: Rob Atkinson’s stoppage-time leveller rescued Pompey a 2-2 draw in a dramatic Championship relegation tussle.

arts.ttl: Bristol City man in shock return as Portsmouth boss makes 5 changes against Derby
arts.sum: Rob Atkinson makes a surprise return to Pompey’s side for the crucial clash with Derby.

arts.ttl: John Eustace makes Derby County change as he names team for crunch Portsmouth clash
arts.sum: Derby: Zetterstrom, Langas, Phillips, Clarke; Wilson, Adams, Armstrong, Harness, Forsyth; Mendez-Laing, Yates Nathaniel Mendez-Laing made his return to the team in place of Liam Thompson who dropped to the bench in what was the only alteration from Tuesday night's draw with promotion-chasing Burnley.

arts.ttl: LIVE Portsmouth v Derby County: build-up, team news and live updates of crucial Championship clash
arts.sum: It’s the big one - as Pompey and Derby County collide at Fratton Park this afternoon.
